QuestData.Title: Secrets of Telemancy
QuestData.Description: The nightborne are no strangers to this place. It was once our capital too, long ago.$b$bBefore the Sundering and erecting the shield over Suramar we used to travel freely to Zin-Azshari. Oculeth had a workshop in these estates. $b$bPerhaps it might contain some secrets or magic that went undisturbed by the survivors.
